productRevisionRuleCmdDescription: Edit the revision rule of the product scope associated with a Build Element, or of the product assignments of an Activity.
productRevisionRuleMultipleBEName: Product scope configuration for {0} selected Build Elements:
productRevisionRuleMultipleActivityName: Product assignments configuration for {0} selected Activities:
productRevisionNoProductAssociteWithBE: There is no product associated with "{0}".
productRevisionSomeOfActivitiesHasNoProd: Some of the Activities you selected do not have a product scope associated. Edit the product revision rule of the other selected Activities?
productRevisionSomeOfBuildElementsHasNoP: Some of the Build Elements you selected do not have a product scope associated. Edit the product revision rule of the other selected Build Elements?
productRevisionCanotRevisionRuleWithDiff: Revision rule cannot be edited for Build Elements and Activities at once. Please select only one of these types and try again.
productRevisionNoProductAssociteWithBEs: There is no product associated with the selected Build Elements.
productRevisionNoProductAssociteWithActi: The selected activities do not have product assignments.
